3. ReferenceÂ¶

Classificrops helps to convert one LPIS classification toward the Indicative Crops Classification(ICC) made by the FAO, in a semi-automated way. Classificrops is a tool able to convert one crops classification from an european country/region to the Indicative Crop Classification made by the FAO in a semi-automated way.

Agrivolution is a tool able - The convert function converts one LPIS classification toward the Indicative Crops Classification(ICC) made by the FAO, in a semi-automated way.

  • The view_stats function view croplands statistics from Occitania and Catalonia, grouped according to the icc classification.
